WorkItem.Description: Unless I'm missing a filter (which I'm pretty sure I'm not) I can't load ArP gems into my gearset. How would I go about fixing this, if I CAN fix this?

Comments.Message: Add the gems by item ID in the item editor, and then make a custom gemming using the gems.

Thank you, now the gems are on my item list, but I can't add them to a custom gemming or gemming template. (I have show profession items checked and hide unavailable gems unchecked so that shouldn't be a problem)
Can you clarify your situation more? What model? Where do you see arpen gems, and where do you not? What gems specifically? ArPen gems are fully supported.

DPS warrior model.
Seeing the ArP gems on my item list (when I hit edit item).
Not seeing them on "create gem template" or "create custom gemming" or "equip custom gemming"
